text:
Hi friends, I´m Daniel Kupka and I run <http://frontpagedata.com|frontpagedata.com>.

We’re a collection of writers and data scientists, that are obsessed with creating and spreading quality, data-driven information. To us, talking about data, analyzing and visualizing it, and turning it into content is the most interesting job in the world.

Excited to learn and share with you about agency operations, sales and finance!
